title: Software Engineer
description:
SnapNfit is one of India‚Äôs fastest\\-growing ‚Äúfitness at your doorstep‚Äù platforms \\- building premium tech for personal training, physiotherapy, yoga, and more.
 




  






 We‚Äôre expanding our tech team and looking for a Junior Developer / Intern who wants to grow fast, build real features end\\-to\\-end, and work directly with founders.
 




  






 ‚≠ê Who you are:
 



* Passionate about building real products
* Eager to learn modern full\\-stack development
* Ready to work in a fast\\-paced startup environment


- 



 üõ†Ô∏è Tech you‚Äôll work on:
 



* Next.js (App Router)
* React \\+ TailwindCSS
* Node.js / Python FastAPI
* Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage)
* Razorpay Payment Integration
* AI/LLM Integrations (optional but bonus)
* REST APIs, serverless functions, UI components


- 



 üß© What you‚Äôll build:
 



* Payment flows (UPI, cards, subscriptions)
* User \\+ Trainer dashboards
* Admin panels
* Real\\-time scheduling \\& session booking
* Internal tools
* AI\\-driven features (voice, chat, automation)



  






 üéØ Perks:
 



* Work directly with the founder/CTO
* Real\\-world product building
* Learning fast in a live production environment
* PPO opportunity based on performance
* Certificate \\+ LinkedIn recommendation


- 



 If you want to build serious things and grow 10x faster, SnapNfit is the place.
 




  





  






 Role: Junior Developer / Software Intern
 





 Location:¬† Remote
 





 Duration: 3‚Äì6 months (extendable)
 





 Stipend: Based on skills
   






 Responsibilities
 


 You will work directly with the founder \\& CTO to:
 




  





 Frontend (Primary focus)
 
* Build responsive UI using Next.js (App Router)
* Convert Figma designs into smooth, modern interfaces
* Implement reusable components with React \\+ TailwindCSS
* Work on complex dashboards and data flows for:
* Core SnapNfit Users, Trainers, Admin¬† \\& Operations team
* Build scalable and responsive booking interfaces, forms, calendars, slot selection, etc.



 Backend
 
* Build REST endpoints using Node.js or Python FastAPI
* Integrate with Supabase (Postgres)
* Work on role\\-based access, auth, admin tools




 Payments
 



* Implement Razorpay Standard Checkout
* Subscriptions, UPI Autopay, card payments, payment webhooks



  





 AI Layer (Bonus but not required)
 
* Integrate LLM APIs
* Build small automated flows
* Add voice/text\\-based search assistants



  





  





 Tech Stack
 


 You will get hands\\-on experience with:
 



* Next.js 15\\+ (React Server Components)
* React \\+ TailwindCSS
* TypeScript
* Node.js / Python FastAPI
* Supabase (PostgreSQL, RPCs, Auth)
* Razorpay Payments \\& Subscriptions
* GitHub \\+ Vercel Deployment (Strong Git focus is bonus)
* AI/LLM APIs (OpenAI, Together, Groq)



 üéØ Requirements
 
* Basic experience with JavaScript/TypeScript
* Understanding of React fundamentals
* Some hands\\-on experience with API integration
* Passion for learning modern frameworks
* Strong ownership \\& problem\\-solving attitude
* Bonus: experience with backend or UI animations



 üíé Why Join SnapNfit?
 
* Build features that real users use daily
* Direct mentorship from founder/CTO
* Ship fast ‚Üí learn fast ‚Üí grow fast
* PPO available for top performers
* Flexible work culture
* Opportunity to work on AI \\+ app development
* Immediate impact \\+ autonomy in decisions



  






 üìß Apply at contact@snapnfit.com (Resume \\+ GitHub \\+ LinkedIn \\+ 2 project links \\+ WebSite (optional) )

title: Developer - FullStack (.NET/REACT)
description:
**Company Description**
**About Sopra Steria**
 Sopra Steria, a major Tech player in Europe with 50,000 employees in nearly 30 countries, is recognised for its consulting, digital services and solutions. It helps its clients drive their digital transformation and obtain tangible and sustainable benefits. The Group provides end\\-to\\-end solutions to make large companies and organisations more competitive by combining in\\-depth knowledge of a wide range of business sectors and innovative technologies with a collaborative approach. Sopra Steria places people at the heart of everything it does and is committed to putting digital to work for its clients in order to build a positive future for all. In 2024, the Group generated revenues of ‚Ç¨5\\.8 billion.
   

  

**Job Description**
**The world is how we shape it.**
**JD in Nutshell:**
**Mandatory:** 
 Minimum of 5\\-6 years of experience in software development, with a strong focus on:
   

  

* .NET
* SQL
* React.


**Good to Have:**
* PHP


***Detailed JD***
*:*
* Solid proficiency in .NET (C\\#, ASP.NET Core, MVC, Web API).
* Strong experience with SQL (T\\-SQL, database design, and optimization).
* Good knowledge of PHP for back\\-end development.
* Extensive experience in React for front\\-end development, including hooks, state management, and component design.
* Strong understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices.
* Ability to work with version control systems like Git.
* Ability to simplify technical specification to Business stakeholders
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to debug complex systems.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.
* Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies.


 Total Experience Expected: 04\\-06 years
   

  

**Qualifications**
 A Bachelor/ Master Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, or relevant field with 5\\-6 years of software development experience (.Net/REACT):
   

  

**Additional Information**
 At our organization, we are committed to fighting against all forms of discrimination. We foster a work environment that is inclusive and respectful of all differences.
   

  

 All of our positions are open to people with disabilities.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Are you a full\\-stack developer who thrives on turning ambitious ideas into reality?** 
 We're not just building an app; we're solving a massive problem, and we need someone with a fire in their belly to help us get there.
 



**Your Mission:** 




**Architect and build the web or mobile application that will change the game. This isn't a 9\\-to\\-5 gig; it's a chance to make a real impact alongside a team of passionate, driven developers who are obsessed with pushing boundaries.** 




**Your Superpowers:** 



* **Node.js Ninja \\& React.js Rockstar:** 
 You've got 2\\-6 years of experience building scalable backends with Node.js and crafting beautiful UIs with React.js, Astro, Next.js, or Qwik. You're not afraid to dive deep into code and emerge with elegant solutions.
* **Relentless Problem Solver:** 
 You're a go\\-getter who doesn't stop until the job is done right. You thrive on challenges and find creative ways to overcome obstacles.
* **Bias for Action:** 
 You're not one to wait around for instructions. You take initiative, anticipate needs, and proactively drive projects forward.
* **Open\\-Source Advocate:** 
 You believe in the power of community and are eager to contribute to open\\-source projects that benefit everyone.



**Bonus Powers:** 



* **GraphQL, AWS Appsync, Lambda, Dockers, ECS, Firebase, and offline storage** 
 knowledge will make you an even more formidable force.



**What's in it for You:** 



* **Make Your Mark:** 
 This isn't just another job; it's a chance to be part of something extraordinary. Your contributions will directly shape our success.
* **Thrive in a High\\-Energy Environment:** 
 Surround yourself with like\\-minded individuals who are passionate, driven, and always pushing the limits.
* **No Bureaucracy, Just Results:** 
 We value action over formalities. If you're someone who gets things done, you'll fit right in.



**Are you ready to ignite your passion and unleash your potential?** 




  





*Location: HSR Layout, Bangalore.* 




*Salary Range : 4\\-12LPA* 




***Immediate joiners are preferred.***




***Minimum 2 years of experience in building software products is required. Profile will be rejected automatically for \\<2 years of experience.***

title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Senior Fullstack Engineer
description:
**About Allica Bank**
 Allica is the UK‚Äôs fastest growing company \\- and the fastest\\-growing financial technology (Fintech) firm ever. Our purpose is to help established SMEs, one of the last major underserved opportunities in Fintech.
   

  

 Established SMEs are the backbone of local communities \\- representing over a third of our economy \\- yet have been largely neglected both by traditional high street banks and modern fintech providers.
   

  

**Role Description**
 As a Senior Software Engineer (Full\\-Stack), you‚Äôll design, build, and launch end\\-to\\-end features that directly impact thousands of business customers. You‚Äôll work across the stack and challenge conventional thinking to drive quality, performance, and stability. You‚Äôll thrive here if you love solving complex problems, shipping iteratively, and working in a highly collaborative, fast\\-paced environment.
   

  

**High\\-level**
**Principal Accountabilities**
* Deliver impactful features and enhancements. Ensure exceptional experience for our users.
* Keep the lights on for our platform.
* Find the best solution, challenge the consensus when you see a better path forward.
* Drive continuous improvements to the platform, processes, and tooling.


**Detailed**
* Solutions: collaborate with Product to better understand the problem, brainstorm solutions, challenge assumptions and the status quo.
* Architecture: non\\-functional requirements, system design, peer reviews.
* Scoping: break work into tasks, estimate, refine and align with the team
* Implementation: write clean, testable, and maintainable code. Test thoroughly using a combination of unit tests, integration, e2e and manual exploratory testing.
* Deployment: create build and release pipelines, deploy infrastructure using infrastructure\\-as\\-code, ship changes under feature flags.
* Maintenance: ensure observability, resolve problems, alerts, incidents and BAU requests.
* Drive the changes: retrospective analysis, RCA / Lessons learned, change requests.
* Share the expertise: mentor junior engineers through code reviews, pairing and feedback.


**Personal Attributes \\& Experience**
* 7\\+ years of experience in engineering roles.
* 3\\+ years of experience working with C\\# / .NET.
* 1\\+ years of experience working with React / TypeScript.
* Proficiency in cloud/distributed systems design and implementation.
* Strong unit, integration testing, mock frameworks and debugging skills.
* Experience with PaaS, ideally Azure.
* Experience with SQL (Azure SQL is a plus).
* Experience with Docker, containers and Kubernetes.


**Working at Allica Bank**
 At Allica Bank we want to ensure our employees have the right tools and environment in which to succeed in their role and in support of our customers.
   

  

 Our employees are at the heart of everything we do, so our benefits are designed with you in mind:
   

  

* Full onboarding support and continued development opportunities
* Options for flexible working
* Regular social activities
* Pension contributions
* Discretionary bonus scheme
* Private health cover
* Life assurance
* Family friendly policies including enhanced Maternity \\& Paternity leave


**Don‚Äôt tick every box?**
 Don‚Äôt worry if you don‚Äôt have all the skills or requirements listed on the job description. If you think you‚Äôll be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you!
   

  

**Flexible working**
 We know the ‚Äò9\\-to\\-5‚Äô isn‚Äôt right for everyone. That‚Äôs why Allica Bank is fully committed to flexible and hybrid working. Please let us know what is best for you and, if we can, we will do our best to accommodate.
   

  

**Diversity**
 We‚Äôre a diverse bunch here at Allica, with all kinds of experiences, backgrounds and lifestyles. Our openness and differences make us stronger, and we want everybody to feel comfortable bringing as much of themselves to work with them as they like.

title: SFCC B2C Developer
description:
**SFCC B2C Developer** 




  





 Are you a seasoned
 **Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) B2C Developer** 
 looking for a challenging role where you can design, develop, and optimize cutting\\-edge e\\-commerce solutions? Join our team and play a key role in building seamless, high\\-performing digital shopping experiences that delight customers and elevate major brands!
 



  





**The Role** 




  





 We're looking for an experienced developer (6\\-12 years) to drive the design, development, and optimization of e\\-commerce solutions on the SFCC platform. You'll work cross\\-functionally to deliver scalable, performant, and feature\\-rich digital experiences.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 
 (Key Responsibilities)
 



  




* **Develop \\& Customize:** 
 Design, develop, and customize SFCC B2C solutions to meet complex business and client needs.
* **Front\\-End Expertise:** 
 Implement and optimize front\\-end components using
 **ISML, JavaScript, CSS, HTML** 
 , and other relevant front\\-end technologies.
* **Integrations:** 
 Integrate third\\-party services, APIs, and payment gateways to expand platform functionality.
* **Performance \\& Security:** 
 Optimize site performance, security, and scalability to ensure a seamless user experience.
* **Best Practices:** 
 Stay updated on SFCC best practices, emerging technologies, and industry trends.
* **Troubleshooting:** 
 Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues efficiently, ensuring maintainable and reusable solutions.
* **Collaboration:** 
 Work closely with designers, product managers, and developers to create user\\-friendly and scalable features.



  





**What You'll Bring** 
 (Qualifications)
 



  




* **Experience:** 
 Proven experience as a
 **Salesforce Commerce Cloud B2C Developer** 
 (6\\-12 years).
* **Technical Proficiency:** 
 Strong proficiency in SFCC development, including
 **ISML, JavaScript, OCAPI/SCAPI, SFRA** 
 experience and a deep understanding of how to use it.
* **Design Patterns:** 
 Experience with
 **MVC design patterns** 
 .
* **Problem\\-Solving:** 
 Strong problem\\-solving skills and a keen eye for detail.
* **Communication:** 
 Excellent written and verbal communication skills; fluent in English.
* **Bonus Points:** 
 Familiarity with
 **Headless Commerce** 
 and
 **API\\-First architectures** 
 , experience integrating third\\-party services, a
 **Salesforce Commerce Cloud Developer certification** 
 , and experience with
 **Page Designer** 
 .

title: Senior System Engineer-Avionics
description:
Job description
 



  





 Company Description
 



 Qubist Solutions LLC is a leader in software innovations, architecture, design, development, and testing for industries such as avionics, automotive, medical, railways, IoT, and digital solutions. With extensive expertise in Aerospace and Avionics Software Design, Qubist specializes in development and Verification \\& Validation (V\\&V) processes adhering to RTCA/DO\\-178B standards for software levels A through D. Our company is committed to delivering cutting\\-edge solutions that meet the highest industry standards. Partnering with us means contributing to groundbreaking advancements across diverse technical domains.
 



  





 Role Description
 



 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Senior System Engineer \\- Avionics based in Bengaluru/Pune. The Senior System Engineer will be responsible for designing and overseeing system architecture, ensuring seamless system integration, and leading systems engineering efforts. The role also involves collaborating with software development teams to deliver innovative and reliable avionics solutions, meeting compliance standards and quality requirements.
 



  





 As a key technical leader, you'll be at the forefront of building the embedded networks that power everything from commercial airliners and rotorcraft to next\\-gen military fighters. You‚Äôll play a pivotal role in shaping and deploying resilient, deterministic networks capable of handling the extreme demands of real\\-time flight operations.
 



  





 What You Will Do:
 



  




* Architect and design computing systems for aircraft management that meet the stringent requirements of safety\\-critical avionics systems.
* Serve as the technical authority and point of contact for all computing and graphics\\-related questions across multiple programs.
* Capture and translate source requirements into system architecture, interface definitions, and configuration strategies.
* Collaborate with internal computing, graphics, and networking fellows, and cross\\-functional experts to shape the next generation of secure, fault\\-tolerant avionics computing and graphics systems.
* Lead system\\-level integration, troubleshooting, and verification activities in lab environments.
* Drive the development of automated test strategies and tools and ensure robust validation across network interfaces.
* Mentor other systems engineers and collaborate closely with hardware, software, and firmware teams to deliver cohesive and scalable system designs.
* Contribute to the bid and pursuit process, providing technical insight and proposal leadership for networking solutions.
* Willingness to travel as needed.



  





 Qualifications
 


* Typically requires a B.E.\\\\B.Tech\\\\ M.Tech\\\\M.E. and minimum 6 years prior relevant experience in a writing system requirements for avionics systems.
* End\\-to\\-end systems engineering experience: requirements definition, design, integration, V\\&V, and deployment.
* Experience with real\\-time embedded systems, hardware/software interfaces, and systems integration.
* Expertise in designing and specifying computing and graphics architectures, including but not limited to:
* Communication protocols: ARINC 429, MIL\\-STD\\-1553, ARINC 629, or ARINC 818\\.
* Embedded Computing or System on a Chip.
* Experience with safety\\-critical development standards, such as DO\\-178C, DO\\-254, ARP4754B, and ARP4761
* Familiarity with avionics standards such as RTCA/DO\\-178B is a plus
* Ability to work collaboratively in an on\\-site environment in Bengaluru/Pune
* Background in virtualized architectures, data flows, or advanced avionics bus protocols
* Experience with Model\\-Based Systems Engineering
* Excellent interpersonal and technical communication skills, including documentation and interface negotiation
* Strong sense of ownership, mission focus, and the ability to thrive in high\\-reliability aerospace environments
* Familiarity with ARINC 653, ARINC 661, or FACE architecture.
* Experience with software security and partitioning strategies.
* Background in agile methodologies and DevOps for embedded systems.
* Exposure to model\\-based design tools such as SCADE, Simulink, or Enterprise Architect.
* Expertise in C/C\\+\\+ programming, real\\-time operating systems (e.g., VxWorks, INTEGRITY).
* Hands\\-on experience in design and development of FMS, Mission Computer, Display Software, or similar.
* Thorough understanding of software safety standards (DO\\-178C) and system\\-software interfaces.
* Strong analytical skills and experience with architectural modeling tools (e.g., UML, SysML).
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills; experience working with global teams.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
The
 **Senior Data Science Engineer** 
 at
 **Dentsu (www.dentsu.com)** 
 will play a key role in architecting and implementing scalable, production\\-ready data science solutions that power our digital identity resolution and personalization capabilities across Dentsu platforms. You will collaborate closely with product managers, data engineers, and identity specialists to design advanced machine learning pipelines, optimize model performance, and ensure seamless deployment within cloud\\-native environments.
 



 We are specifically looking for an expert in
 **deep learning for time series data** 
 .
 



  





 Experience \\- 5\\-10 years
 



 Location: Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune, Coimbatore
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and implement deep learning frameworks for time series modeling.
* Partner with identity domain experts to transform heuristic logic into robust algorithmic frameworks.
* Clearly articulate trade\\-offs in model interpretability, generalization, and operational complexity. Demonstrate where learned representations outperform heuristic methods‚Äîparticularly in handling edge cases, reducing false positives, and adapting to evolving patterns.
* Architect and implement end\\-to\\-end machine learning solutions for digital identity resolution.
* Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure model scalability, reliability, and performance in production.
* Work closely with product and operations teams to define success metrics, evaluate model impact, and support ongoing monitoring.



  





**Qualifications** 



* 5\\+ years of experience in data science or machine learning.
* Proven expertise in developing deep learning‚Äìbased time series solutions.
* Experience with any Time Series Forecasting (Classical Statistical Models)\\- ARMA, ARIMAX, AR, SARIMA, SARIMAX, ARIMA models
* Strong programming skills in
 **Python** 
 and
 **SQL**
* Experience with cloud platforms (preferably
 **AWS** 
 ) and distributed computing frameworks.
* Hands\\-on experience working with large datasets using
 **EMR** 
 and/or
 **Snowflake** 
 .
* Strong track record of building and deploying deep learning models in production environments.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or Engineering.



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Experience using
 **Snowflake Cortex** 
 .
* Familiarity with MLOps practices and tools such as
 **MLflow** 
 ,
 **SageMaker** 
 , and
 **Airflow** 
 .

title: OSS Engineer
description:
Who we are
   

  

 VOIS (Vodafone Intelligent Solutions) is a strategic arm of Vodafone Group Plc, creating value for customers by delivering intelligent solutions through Talent, Technology \\& Transformation.
   

  

 As the largest shared services organisation in the global telco industry with 30,000 FTE, our portfolio of next\\-generation solutions and services are designed in partnership with customers across Vodafone Group, local markets, and partner markets to simplify and drive growth. With our strategic partner Accenture, we work alongside our Vodafone customers, other Telco and tech companies to drive transformation, meet the challenges of our industry and ensure we stay relevant and resilient. This partnership is a unique, industry\\-first model which brings together the best of in\\-house and 3rd party capability.
   

  

 We work with customers across 28 countries from 10 VOIS locations: Albania, Egypt, Hungary, India, Romania, Spain, Turkey, UK, Germany, Ireland, and with a network of teams in Czech Republic, Italy, Greece, and Portugal.
   

  

 \\#VOIS \\#BeUnrivalled \\#CreateTheFuture
   

  

**About This Role**
 We are seeking an OSS Engineer with strong Java knowledge to develop and automate test cases, assess application usability and performance, and collaborate with developers to enhance quality throughout the development lifecycle. This role is based in Pune and requires experience in both manual and automated testing, along with familiarity with Agile methodologies and CI/CD integration.
   

  

 What you will do
   

  

* Create comprehensive test documentation, including Test Plans, Risk Assessments, and Test Results.
* Analyse requirements to design and execute test cases for user stories using tools such as Jira and SQL Developer.


 Drive innovation through adoption of new tools, methods, and standards.
   

  

* Conduct application testing with end\\-users to ensure solutions meet business needs.


 Who you are
   

  

* Proficient in Java for test automation and open to manual testing alongside automation initiatives.
* Skilled in scripting languages such as Python or Shell.
* Experienced in Agile/SCRUM environments and associated tooling.
* Knowledgeable in deploying and performance testing Java applications (WAR, EAR, JAR) on WebLogic.
* Exposure to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) is an advantage.
* Excellent communication skills in English and ability to work effectively in multicultural, distributed teams.
* Holds an engineering degree in Computer Science or equivalent.


 Not a Perfect Fit?
   

  

 Concerned you may not meet every requirement? Vodafone is committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. If you are excited about this role but your experience does not align exactly with every aspect of the job description, you are encouraged to apply. You may be the right candidate for this or another opportunity, and the recruitment team will support you in exploring where your skills fit best.
   

  

 What‚Äôs in it for you
   

  

* Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge OSS solutions in a global organisation.
* Exposure to advanced automation frameworks and CI/CD pipelines.
* Collaborative work environment with international teams.
* Career growth through continuous learning and innovation.


**What Skills You Will Learn**
* Advanced test automation techniques and integration with CI/CD.
* Performance testing and deployment of Java applications on enterprise platforms.
* Agile practices and tools for efficient software delivery.
* Cross\\-cultural collaboration and communication in global projects.


**VOIS Equal Opportunity Employer Commitment**
 Vodafone recognises and celebrates the value of diversity in building a workforce that reflects the customers and communities it serves. No form of discrimination is tolerated. This includes, but is not limited to, discrimination based on race, colour, age, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, maternity or parental status, ethnicity, disability, religion or belief, political affiliation, trade union membership, nationality, citizenship, indigenous status, medical condition, HIV status, neurodiversity, social origin, cultural background, marital or civil partnership status, or socio\\-economic background.
   

  

**Join Us**
 At Vodafone, we‚Äôre working hard to build a better future. A more connected, inclusive and sustainable world. As a dynamic global community, it's our human spirit, together with technology, that empowers us to achieve this.
   

  

 We challenge and innovate in order to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.
   

  

 With us, you can truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.
   

  

**Alert**
 Apply for Vodafone jobs only through the official Vodafone Careers website to avoid job scams and fraud.
   

  

**\\#JDEnhancedByTARA**
**Follow us on social media and \\#StayConnected**
* LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/vois/
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/voisglobal
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/voisglobal/
* Chat with our employees: https://lnkd.in/dpkrcvR2

title: PLM Teamcenter Developer - Hyderabad / Pune / Bubhaneswar
description:
**Total Exp : 10 to 16 Years** 




**Locatioons : Hyderabad / Pune / Bhubaneswar** 




  





**Desired Skills:** 




  





 1\\. 10\\+ years of experience in designing and developing scalable enterprise level Teamcenter solution
 



 2\\. Experience with translating sophisticated functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design
 



 3\\. Full lifecycle PLM enterprise application implementation experience (e.g., analyze, design, build, test, implement, support)
 



 4\\. Architect, design, develop, configure, customize and maintain, all aspects of a business critical
 



 Teamcenter application including the following areas: Web Tier (TcWeb), ServerManager (Pool
 



 manager), enterprise tier, TCCS, BMIDE, TcRA, IMM, AWC, FMS, Teamcenter Security Services,
 



 dispatcher services, and Teamcenter integrations for various ECAD, MCAD, and MBSE tools
 



 5\\. Ability to plan application roadmap based on Teamcenter product roadmap; identify business
 



 requirements and map them to Teamcenter capabilities
 



 6\\. Technical Specifications for RICEFW (reports, integrations, customizations, extensions, forms,
 



 workflows)
 



 7\\. Development phase strategy \\& planning documentation (data migration, integration, test, etc.)
 



 8\\. Lead architectural design discussions to address business requirements
 



 9\\. Excellent communication, organizational and leadership skills
 



 10\\. Able to work/coordinate with multiple teams, Experience with leading and mentoring engineers
 



 11\\. Ability to optimally multi\\-task and support multiple, concurrent projects
 



 12\\. Knowledge of Materials Declaration, IPC 1752/1753, EPEAT, RoHS and REACH compliance is nice to have
